Virtual Host:

mydrupalsite.dev
mydrupalsite_db

On Windows changes for creating virtual host:

1. Navigate to C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc
2. Change file type to all files.
3. Open hosts file.
4. Add this at the end of the line:

127.0.0.1 mydrupalsite.dev

5. Save file.
6. Start Apache.
7. Enter virtual host name to web browser address bar

Continous Deployment:

Maturity Model Phase 1(3-6 months)

1. Trusted Source Control and Issue tracking
2. TDD
3. Continous integration
4. Automation of deployments
5. And you are still nowhere near continous deployment

Phase 1 Activities:

Write test first
Write deployment scripts first
Pair program on the challenging parts
Increase the frequency of everything which means automate everything

TDD in 1 Week Outline:
1. Refuse to write console.log statements or use the debugger(because of typo problem such as semi-colon or type checking problem)
2. If you are using Javascript,you are screwed if you dont write tests.

Automation in 1 Week
1. Dont type anything in a remote shell.Do eveything via Fabric,Capistrano,etc
2. Put your automation code in git submodule so you can reuse across your projects
3. When stable(after a few projects) turn it into a node module with reference in package.json


Maturity Model Phase 2(6-9 months):

What are the chances of getting a small feature deployed into production safely in 1 hr

1. Feature based thinking
A. small,logical commits with good commit messages
B. good tests(and an architect that supports them)
C. Continous integration metrics are trending excellent

Comfortable feature flow
1. WIP is managed via real Scrum/Kanban
2. all features reviewed or pair-programmed(strongly related to pull request)
3. deployment to staging is semi-automated
4. Focus on clarity,sustainability,and velocity - i.e flow,not capacity

Phase 2 Activities:

1. Lots of Git hooks
2. JSHint
3. Reject any commit that doesn't pass lint and that doesn't have a headline
4. Single commit per pull request(git inteactive rebasing)
5. Everyone is a Git ninja and the commits are clear,concise and independent

Phase 3(9-12 months):

Are you ready for multiple deploys per day?
1. First commit acceptance rate
2. % Issues captured on staging versus production
3. Are you discussing getting rid of the staging server
4. How fast are your deploys?Rollbacks?

Phase 3 Activities:

1. Review performance metrics
2. Clear define the cost-benefit of production failures
3. Increase frequencies of deployments in the concept of your production failure risk profile

Tools:

1. GIT
2. Jenkins
3. Mocha
4. Karma
5. Kanban/Scrum(Trello)
6. Commitment

GIT for Continous Deployment

1. git rebase master every day
2. git rebase interactive
A. Before pull request
B. every few days on more complex features


Mastering Commits rebase
1. If rebasing branches already push remotely
A. ensure only admin can rewrite master
B. Configure all local environments to only push current branch

gitconfig
[push]
default = upstream

How did your prepare to start learning at Bloc?
I knew going into Bloc that my biggest area of improvement was my ability to code in Ruby - I was familiar enough with the Rails framework but creating custom Ruby code was still challenging. So I practiced Ruby every day. 
Our selection process requires between 40-50 hours of background reading

Break down the problem into the simplest possible parts. Try to do them one at a time, such as in a console, so you can clearly understand what is and isnâ€™t working.
Duplicating of a whole line : CTRL+D . Setting the cursor at the end of any line and pressing this combination ,  duplicates the current line (the new line is positioned under the current line)
Regex pattern for form validation
1. websignup_review_form_validate($form, &$form_state)
2. ava_websignup_form_alter($form, &$form_state,$form_id)
3. ava_websignup_webform_submission_insert($node,$submission)

ava_websignup.module functions:

1. ava_websignup_webform_submission_insert($node,$submission)
2. ava_websignup_form_alter(&$form, &$form_state, $form_id)
3. websignup_review_form_validate(&$form, &$form_state)
